directions: In a large saucepan, combine the water, potatoes, onions and celery. Bring to a boil and then reduce heat to low. Simmer for 20 minutes. Add frozen vegetables and simmer 10 more minutes. Add the cans of soup and the cheese and cook slowly, until the cheese melts.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of chicken soup
title: Creamy Vegetable Cheese Soup
